Utilities
public static
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Utilities

This class contains any utility functions that TouchFree Tooling uses.

Functions
MapRangeToRange
public static float MapRangeToRange(
float _value,
float _oldMin,
float _oldMax,
float _newMin,
float _newMax
)

Map _value from a range of _oldMin to _oldMax to a new range of _newMin to _newMax.

e.g. the result of MapRangeToRange(0.5f, 0f, 1f, 0f, 8f) is 4.
